title.narrative: India - Capacity Building for Industrial Pollution Management

description.narrative: To strengthen the capacity of selected state pollution control agencies in the remediation of polluted sites and to support development of a framework to establish a national program for the remediation of polluted sites.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Andhra Pradesh Project Agreement: |Description: Carry out its Respective Part of the Project in accordance with the EnvironmentalManagement Plan and the Social Management Plan, including the provisions on resettlement, indigenous peoples, and incomerestoration support, for the respective Project sites.| Frequency: Continuous

Finance Agreement :- | Description :Designate and maintain throughout the period of project implementation, a Project Director, whoshall be responsible for the effective and timely coordination and implementation of project | Frequency :Monthly
Finance Agreement :- | Description :Ensure that the Project activities are consistent with the POM | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :- | Description :Establish and maintain a Project Oversight Committee throughout the period of projectimplementation, which shall be chaired by theSecretary MOEF | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :- | Description :iv). Ensure that the Project Director shall have adequate decision-making authority requiredfor the effective, efficient and timely implementation of project activities. | Frequency :Monthly

title.narrative: Capacity of technical staff of the participating agencies strengthened to prepare, implement and monitor remediation plans
Contaminated land managed or dump sites closed under the project
People with reduced direct exposure to pollution from sites remediated by the project
Remediation plans prepared based on risk based approach and ready for implementation in all the three participating states
Number of parameters that can be analyzed by the laboratories of Andhra Pradesh, Telangana and West Bengal Pollution Control Boards, increased
Online network of State Pollution Control Boards for remediation established
Post-remediation monitoring system with appropriate infrastructure and approved indicators established for all the three remediation sites by the completion of remediation works

actual.value: Post-remediation monitoring developed and will be

title.narrative: Frame work for the establishment of NPRPS comprising inventory of polluted sites, remediation methodologies and policy and regulatory reviews developed

actual.value: Yes - Final Frame Work Developed and the Technical Review Committee has recommended 'Rules for Remediation of Contaminated Sites'for MoEF Approval

title.narrative: National guidelines for the remediation of polluted sites developed

target.value: Yes - Guidelines integrated in the remediation framework

actual.value: Yes - Guidelines integrated in the remediation framework

title.narrative: Inventory of Polluted Sites in India developed
Methodologies for remediation of polluted Sites in India developed

target.value: Yes - Methodologies developed part of the remediation framework

title.narrative: Policy options for remediation of polluted sites developed based on a review of existing legislations and international experiences
